verses.verse: I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> unto the hills <S%H2022><s%>, from from where <S%H370><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> my help <S%H5828><s%>.
My help <S%H5828><s%> comes from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, which made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>.
He will not allow <S%H5414><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> to be moved <S%H4132><s%>: he that keeps <S%H8104><s%> you will not slumber <S%H5123><s%>.
Behold <S%H8104><s%>, he that keeps Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall neither slumber <S%H5123><s%> nor sleep <S%H3462><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is your keeper <S%H8104><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is your shade <S%H6738><s%> upon your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.
The sun <S%H8121><s%> shall not strike <S%H5221><s%> you by day <S%H3119><s%>, nor the moon <S%H3394><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall preserve <S%H8104><s%> you from all evil <S%H7451><s%>: he shall preserve <S%H8104><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall preserve <S%H8104><s%> your going out <S%H3318><s%> and your coming in <S%H935><s%> from this time forth <S%H5704><s%>, and even for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
